casebody.data:
Zimmer, Respondent, v. New York Cent. & H. R. R. Co., Appellant, (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. March 15, 1892.) Action by Alvah J. Zimmer against the Hew York Central & Hudson River Railroad Company.

Argued before Mayham, P. J., and Putnam and Herrick, JJ.

Ho opinion. Motion to amend order of previous general term granted. See 16 N. Y. Supp. 631.
